name: Aquapocalypse
description: Aquapocalyspe is a fun single-player game in which the user swims around collecting food while avoiding the bad fishies in an apocalyptical setting!

name: OhSo_Bored
description: Feeling bored? Jump over to OhSo_Bored, where you can find a fun idea of something to do while seeing threehumorous GIFs relevant to the idea!

name: Coffee Orders
description: Order up! Play this simple game in which you receive orders for coffees and provide the amount of creamers needed as indicated by the board above

name: The Color Game
description: In this chance-based game, you'll try to survive as long as possible against your opponents and the random number generator. Will you outlast the others?

name: BlogHub
description: Have something to tell the computer world? Come over to the BlogHub where you can share your techy thoughts and comment on other peoples'

name: Scraggle
description: This game (currently under refactoring) comines the fun of point-values of Scrabble and finding words in a grid of Boggle! My first significant project
